identity.name: The Digital Delta
identity.description: A fusion of Dutch water management authority with high-tech digital twin capabilities. The aesthetic is 'Control Room Chic'â€”dark, data-rich, and precise, but grounded in the organic reality of water and infrastructure.
identity.archetype: The Performance Pro (Archetype 2) mixed with Swiss & High-Contrast (Archetype 4)

scale.caption: text-xs md:text-sm tracking-widest uppercase font-mono text-muted-foreground

usage.background: Deep Obsidian (Slate 950) - The canvas for the digital twin.
usage.primary: Electric Sky (Sky 500) - Represents water, data, and the Rijkswaterstaat blue modernized.
usage.secondary: Signal Yellow (Yellow 500) - Used for 'Alerts', 'Highlights', and 'Call to Actions'. A nod to RWS yellow.
usage.accent: Eco Green (Green 500) - Used for 'Sustainability', 'Growth', and 'Success' states.
usage.surface: Glassmorphism with Slate 900/80 opacity and blur.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for features, High Density Grid (Mode B) for data visualization sections.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold text-sm border-l-4 border-white/20 transition-all hover:pl-10
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-primary/30 text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 h-12 px-8 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold text-sm backdrop-blur-sm

cards.style: bg-slate-900/50 border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-md rounded-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-slate-950/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 rounded-none h-12 font-mono text-sm

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on the entire background to reduce digital flatness.
decorations: Grid lines (1px dashed white/5) in the background.
Corner brackets (SVG) on cards to emphasize the 'Technical/HUD' feel.
Glowing dots (divs with box-shadow) at grid intersections.

motion.reveal: Staggered fade-in + slide-up for text. Scale-in for images.

hero_bg.usage: Hero background overlay (low opacity) behind the Cesium globe.

phases.name: Setup & Global Styles
tasks: Install fonts (Barlow Condensed, Public Sans, JetBrains Mono).
Configure Tailwind colors and font families.
Add global CSS for 'noise' texture and 'lenis' smooth scroll.

phases.name: Hero Section (The Digital Globe)
tasks: Implement CesiumJS viewer (mocked if token missing, but structure ready).
Overlay HUD elements (coordinates, status indicators) using absolute positioning.
Create 'Mission Control' style header with glassmorphism.

phases.name: Features Section (The Tech Stack)
tasks: Card 1 (SAS Viya): Focus on 'Analytics' with data viz abstract image.
Card 2 (Unreal Engine): Focus on 'Fidelity' with 3D render image.
Card 3 (Cesium): Focus on 'Geospatial' with map/globe abstract.
Use 'Tracing Beam' effect on hover for these cards.

phases.name: Use Cases (The Impact)
tasks: Horizontal scroll or grid of high-contrast cards.
Use the Dutch infrastructure images here.

technical_constraints.cesium: Ensure the Cesium container has a defined height (e.g., h-[80vh]). Use a fallback image if the 3D context fails.
technical_constraints.mobile: On mobile, the 3D globe might be too heavy. Consider replacing it with a static high-res render or video loop.
technical_constraints.accessibility: Ensure high contrast between the 'Electric Blue' text and the 'Obsidian' background. Use white for body text.

do_not: Do NOT use gradients for text (readability issues).
Do NOT use rounded corners > 4px (keep it sharp/technical).
Do NOT use generic 'Lorem Ipsum' - use 'System Status: Nominal', 'Data Stream: Active', etc.
must_do: MUST use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.
MUST implement hover states for every interactive element.
MUST use the 'Rijkswaterstaat' colors (Blue/Yellow) as the primary accents.
